alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 05 at 6:58PM PST until December 06 at 5:54AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Oregon... Trask River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon... Siletz River at Siletz affecting Lincoln County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Nehalem River near Foss affecting Clatsop and Tillamook Counties. ...Observed flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Oregon... Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Siletz River at Siletz. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...Above 18.0 feet, expect minor flooding of a small housing development near mile post 8 down stream from Mack Landing. Widespread lowland and pasture land flooding also occurs at this level. Flooding may be exacerbated during high tide. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM PST Tuesday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 12.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:30 PM PST Tuesday was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...River should crest around 18.0 to 18.5 ft late tonight. Then river is expected to recede, dropping below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1230 AM PST.
